props.label: A.5a Reporting period (i.e. contract period) start date
props.hint: Enter start date of the reporting period represented in the report.

props.label: A.5b Reporting period  (i.e. contract period) end date
props.hint: Enter end date of the reporting period represented in the report.

props.label: Exclusion of CHIP from MCPAR
props.hint: Enrollees in separate CHIP programs funded under Title XXI should not be reported in the MCPAR. Please check this box if the state is unable to remove information about Separate CHIP enrollees from its reporting on this program.
